text: Zamana e iddat mein khwa tum un bewa aurton ke saath mangni ki irada ishare kanayi mein zahir kardo, khwa dil mein chupaye rakkho, dono suraton mein koi muzahiqa nahin. Allah jaanta hai ke unka khayal to tumhare dil mein aayega hi magar dekho! Khufiya (hidden) ahad o paiman na karna agar koi baat karni hai to maroof tareeqe se karo aur aqd e nikah baandhne ka faisla us waqt tak na karo jab tak ke iddat poori na ho jaye, khoob samajh lo ke Allah tumhare dilon ka haal tak jaanta hai, lihaza ussey daro aur yeh bhi jaan lo ke Allah burdbaar hai, choti choti baaton se darguzar farmata hai
